summary: Heathrow Airport, now known as London Heathrow, is London's main international airport. It's the biggest and busiest of London's six airports. Located 14 miles west of central London, it started as a small airfield in 1930 and grew after World War II. Today, it has two runways, five terminals, and is a hub for British Airways and Virgin Atlantic. In 2023, Heathrow was Europe's busiest airport and the world's fourth busiest by passenger traffic. It's also the global leader in international connections.
title: Heathrow Airport
